context: The word 'kasvot' in Finnish means 'face'. It is a plural noun, referring to the front part of the head. The dictionary definitions show various forms of the word including genitive ('kasvojen'), partitive ('kasvoja') and different possessive forms like 'kasvoni' (my face) or 'kasvosi' (your face).  It can also be used in compounds, such as 'ihmiskasvot' meaning 'human face'.
